text: niscayanga, evaraite tamu allah to cesina oppandanni mariyu tama pramanalanu svalpalabhalaku am'mukuntaro, alanti variki paraloka jivitanlo elanti bhagam undadu mariyu punarut'thana dinamuna allah varito matladadu mariyu vari vaipu kuda cudadu mariyu varini parisud'dhuluga ceyadu mariyu variki badhakaramaina siksa untundi
